thread.title: Dog taped then stomped to death after urinating on clothing
thread.title_full: Dog taped then stomped to death after urinating on clothing

author: Roberto Acosta | racosta1@mlive.com
title: Dog taped then stomped to death after urinating on clothing
text: "The individual who ultimately called our office with the tip that led to these arrests was actually the mother of one of the defendants (Brown)," said Pickell. "I applaud her courage to do the right thing, and understand the concern she had for others in that household, including her own grandchildren."
